Bethlehem.McCann School of Business & Technology: McCann School of Business & Technology is a for-profit technical school, located in northeastern and central Pennsylvania in the United States. The school maintains seven campuses in Allentown, Carlisle, Dickson City, Hazleton, Pottsville, Lewisburg, and Wilkes-Barre. It was formerly accredited by the Accrediting Council for Independent Colleges and Schools.
